summary: A collection of pytest-based unit tests and supporting utilities that validate the functionality of various Ansible modules (e.g., apt, copy, hostname, iptables, pip, service, systemd, etc.) by mocking system interactions, checking argument handling, and ensuring correct behavior under different scenarios.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of Ansible's core modules through automated testing, enabling rapid detection of regressions and supporting continuous integration pipelines.
